caption:
Table 3. Performance contribution of each component in our 
STIP. HM: Hard Mining strategy for training interaction proposal 
network. TR: vanilla TRansformer. TR SS : TRansformer with 
only Structure-aware Self-attention that exploits inter-interaction 
structure. TR SC : TRansformer with only Structure-aware Cross-
attention that exploits intra-interaction structure.
